Verses: 2 adhigaaramum Bayangaramum Avaridaththil Irukkiradhu; Avar Thamadhu Unnadhamaana Sthalangalil Samaadhaanaththai Undaakkugiraar.
3 avarudaiya Senaigalukkuth Thogaiyundo? Avarudaiya Velichcham Yaarmel Udhikkaamalirukkiradhu?
4 ippadiyirukka, Manushan Dhevanukku Munbaaga Needhimaanaayiruppadhu Eppadi? Sthreeyinidaththil Pirandhavan Suththamaayiruppadhu Eppadi?
5 sandhiranai Annaandhupaarum, Adhuvum Pragaasiyaamalirukkiradhu; Natchaththirangalum Avar Paarvaikku Suththamaanavaigal Alla.
6 puzhuvaayirukkira Manidhanum, Poochchiyaayirukkira Manupuththiranum Emmaaththiram Endraan.
